short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace new tab screen with English word

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Vocab TREE highlights rare English dictionary words on web pages. 
It helps non-native English learners to discover new english words while they are surfing the Internet. 

Learning of new words is useful because some people do not even notice vaguely known words, especially when these words are not critical for understanding of the text that they read.

Learn Random new Words with meaning and Expand your Vocab in english.
